tasks.name: Add `parseReport()` function to parse existing REPORT.md and extract sections for validation
tasks.report: Added parseReport() function to report-template.ts that parses existing REPORT.md files and extracts all sections (summary, accomplishments by stage, file references, issues, next steps)

tasks.name: Add `validateReport()` function to check that required sections have content (not just placeholders)
tasks.report: Added validateReport() function to report-template.ts that validates REPORT.md content, checking required sections have content and returning errors/warnings

tasks.name: Run `bun run typecheck` to verify no type errors
tasks.report: Ran 'bun run typecheck' in workstreams package - no type errors found

tasks.name: Create `docs/README.md` template explaining the directory purpose: "Additional documentation that doesn't fit REPORT.md structure"
tasks.report: docs/README.md template already exists in generate.ts (lines 129-156, 210). Template explains directory purpose: 'Additional documentation that doesn't fit REPORT.md structure' with usage guidelines and organization tips.

tasks.name: Update StreamMetadata type if needed to track docs path
tasks.report: StreamMetadata type does not need updates. The docs/ path is predictable ({streamPath}/docs) and can be derived when needed, similar to PLAN.md and tasks.json locations.

tasks.report: Ran bun run typecheck - no new type errors from docs/ directory changes. Pre-existing errors in agent/tools and scripts are unrelated.

tasks.report: Added 'work report init' subcommand to generate REPORT.md template. Modified report.ts to handle init subcommand with validation and error handling.

tasks.name: Add `work report validate` subcommand to check REPORT.md has required sections filled
tasks.report: Added 'work report validate' subcommand that checks REPORT.md for required sections. Provides errors for missing required content and warnings for optional sections.

tasks.report: Updated generate.ts to create REPORT.md template during workstream creation. Added generateReportMdTemplate() function and updated create.ts CLI output.

tasks.report: Updated printHelp() in report.ts to document 'init' and 'validate' subcommands with usage examples.

tasks.name: Update `work github create-issues` to create stage issues instead of thread issues
tasks.report: Updated work github create-issues to create stage issues instead of thread issues. Added groupTasksByStage(), stageInfoToInput(), isStageComplete(), and createIssuesForStages() functions.

tasks.name: Store created issue in github.json using `setStageIssue()`
tasks.report: createIssuesForStages() stores created issues in github.json using setStageIssue() and handles existing issues from both local and remote sources.

tasks.name: Run `bun run typecheck` and test issue creation
tasks.report: Typecheck passes, all 603 tests pass. Help text verified. Command is ready for use.

tasks.name: Create `syncStageIssues()` function in sync.ts that works with stages instead of threads
tasks.report: Created syncStageIssues() function in sync.ts that iterates through github.json stages, checks if all tasks are complete, and closes issues when appropriate.

tasks.name: Close stage issue when all tasks in stage are completed
tasks.report: Implemented in syncStageIssues() - closes stage issue when isStageComplete() returns true (all tasks completed/cancelled).

tasks.name: Update github.json state field when syncing
tasks.report: Implemented in syncStageIssues() - uses updateStageIssueState() and saveWorkstreamGitHub() to update github.json with closed state and timestamp.

tasks.name: Update `work github sync` command to use new stage-level sync
tasks.report: Updated syncCommand() in github.ts to use syncStageIssues() instead of deprecated syncIssueStates(). Updated output to show stage-level sync results. Also updated help text.

tasks.name: Remove or deprecate thread-level sync functions
tasks.report: Deprecated thread-level sync functions: createIssuesForWorkstream(), isThreadComplete(), getUniqueThreads(), CreateIssuesResult. Updated module header to distinguish stage-level (current) from thread-level (deprecated) functions.

tasks.name: Run `bun run typecheck` and test sync functionality
tasks.report: Typecheck passes. All 603 tests pass. Verified work github sync --help shows updated stage-level documentation.
